sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'; import { Button, Icon, Grid, Header, Segment, Container } from 'semantic-ui-react'; import { Link } from '../routes'; const LandingPage = () => { const features = [ { title: "Secure", description: "Military-grade encryption protects every vote", details: "Blockchain's immutable ledger prevents tampering, while smart contracts enforce voting rules automatically.", icon: "shield alternate" }, { title: "Transparent", description: "Publicly verifiable results", details: "Every transaction is recorded on the blockchain, allowing anyone to audit results without compromising voter privacy.", icon: "eye" }, { title: "Private", description: "Anonymous yet verifiable", details: "Zero-knowledge proofs enable vote verification without revealing voter identity, ensuring complete confidentiality.", icon: "user secret" }, { title: "Fast", description: "Instant results", details: "Decentralized counting eliminates manual processes, delivering final tallies in minutes instead of days.", icon: "bolt" }, { title: "Accessible", description: "Vote from anywhere", details: "Mobile-friendly interface with multi-language support ensures everyone can participate.", icon: "mobile alternate" }, { title: "Auditable", description: "Full election forensic", details: "Timestamped records of all voting activity provide an irrefutable paper trail for disputes.", icon: "search" } ]; return (
{/* --- Hero Section --- */}

BLOCKCHAIN VOTING SYSTEM

A secure, transparent and tamper-proof voting solution powered by blockchain technology.

Every vote counts. Every vote is verifiable. Every vote is immutable.

{/* --- Features Section (Simplified with map) --- */}

Key Features

{features.map((feature, index) => (

{feature.title}

{feature.description}

))}
{/* --- How It Works Section --- */}
How It Works

Voters and companies create secure identities.

Cast votes on the blockchain (encrypted and anonymous).

Real-time, verifiable results with zero fraud.

{/* --- Footer --- */}
© 2023 Blockchain Voting System
); }; export default LandingPage;
